mapper.select: SELECT day(SCHEDULE_date) AS day, COUNT(*) AS cnt, GROUP_CONCAT(substr(SCHEDULE_memo,1,5)) AS memo FROM SCHEDULE WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND YEAR(schedule_date) = #{targetYear} AND MONTH(schedule_date) = #{targetMonth} +1 GROUP BY SCHEDULE_date ORDER BY SCHEDULE_date ASC

SELECT schedule_no AS scheduleNo , member_id AS memberId , schedule_date AS scheduleDate , schedule_emoji AS scheduleEmoji , schedule_memo AS scheduleMemo , createdate FROM schedule WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND YEAR(schedule_date) = #{targetYear} AND MONTH(schedule_date) = #{targetMonth} +2 AND DAY(schedule_date) = #{targetDay} ORDER BY schedule_no DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO schedule( member_id , schedule_date , schedule_emoji , schedule_memo ) VALUES ( #{memberId} , #{scheduleDate} , #{scheduleEmoji} , #{scheduleMemo} )
